mapper.select: select Record_Time, ModelName, StationName, RobotNo, Building, Floor, Area, RunTimes, StandbyTimes, ErrorTimes, Date, Hour from Robot_Status_ByHour

select * from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z

select COUNT(*) from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z

select COUNT(*) from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where z.RobotStatus = 'RUNNING'

select COUNT(*) from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where z.RobotStatus = 'STANDBY' and z.StandbyTimes <= 10

select COUNT(*) from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where z.RobotStatus = 'ERROR' and z.ErrorTimes <= 30

select COUNT(*) from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where z.RobotStatus = 'ERROR' and z.ErrorTimes>30 or z.RobotStatus='STANDBY' and z.StandbyTimes >10

select * from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where RobotNo in( select a.RobotNo from Robot_Info a where a.CustomerName=( select c.id from Customer_Name c where c.CustomerName='${customername}') group by a.RobotNo)

select * from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where z.RobotStatus = 'RUNNING' and RobotNo in( select a.RobotNo from Robot_Info a where a.CustomerName=( select c.id from Customer_Name c where c.CustomerName='${customername}') group by a.RobotNo)

select * from (select y.*,k.RobotStatus from (select * from Robot_Status_ByHour a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(b.Record_Time) as FTime from Robot_Status_ByHour b group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.Record_Time = x.FTime))y,Robot_Status_Now k where y.RobotNo=k.RobotNo) as z where z.RobotStatus = 'STANDBY' and z.StandbyTimes <= 10 and RobotNo in( select a.RobotNo from Robot_Info a where a.CustomerName=( select c.id from Customer_Name c where c.CustomerName='SONY') group by a.RobotNo)
SELECT Robot_Status_Now.RobotNo FROM Robot_Status_Now where ModelName = #{modelname}
